#0a: Define paths.

```{r Define paths, eval=FALSE, engine='bash'}

GFF_Path=~/home/ebazzicalupo/Data #path to gff data
```

#1a: Search in Annotations

```{r Search in Annotations, eval=FALSE, engine='bash'}

cd $GFF_Path
GENES=$(cat GeneList.txt) #file containing list of genes
for i in ${GENES[@]}
  do
  grep "${i}" LYPA23C.all.fix.gff3 > resultados_${i}.txt #for each gene create a file containing results
done  


```
